channel.title: Error idenfier expeced. with if..then..else. plz help

item.title: Error idenfier expeced. with if..then..else. plz help
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:4, topic:5040”][quote author=eagertolearn link=topic=6585.msg67228#msg67228 date=1153012804]
program test;

const
counter = 1;
begin
if (counter = 1) then
writeln(‘Yes!’)
else
writeln(‘No!’);
end.

do u mean like this? if it’s like this then it works but i have noticed that i can only use else if it’s really simple like one action for example:

program example;

arrays: array [1…2] of boolean;

begin
arrays[1]:= true;
arrays [2]:= false;
if(arrays[1]:= true)then
writeln(‘arrays 1 is true!’)
else
writeln(‘arrays[2] is false sry.’);
end.

this will work, but i cant like add more complect stuff like the movemouses and clicking stuff. anyone have anyideas? i’ve followed the tuts and still get this identifer expect error when i use else statment.
[/quote]

That was basically the exact same thing I posted.[/quote]
well… yes that’s basicly it…

but how do u make it work in a realy script complect situation? like not just adding the writelns but alos a whole bunch of other procedure and functions in the if…then…else statement? and dose anyone know anyother format that those if… then words could be used in a script?

Read full topic
item.source: Error idenfier expeced. with if..then..else. plz help

item.title: Error idenfier expeced. with if..then..else. plz help
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Try somthing a little easier like

program test;

const
counter = 1

if (counter = 1) then
 writeln('Yes!');
else
 writeln('No!');

Checks to see if counter = 1, If it does it prints yes. If it = anything else it prints no

Read full topic

item.title: Error idenfier expeced. with if..then..else. plz help
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

hi i’ve read some tut on how to make a if…then…else statment. and i’ve followed it and made my owne i’m sure it should of work but it dosn’t so somebody plz help. there’s the code…

program New; var arrays: array of boolean; begin setarraylength(arrays,2); arrays[0]:= true; arrays[1]:= false; if(arrays[0]= false)then writeln('yay!'); movemousesmooth(random(1000),random(1000)) else writeln('boo!'); movemousesmooth(random(1000),random(1000)); end.

Read full topic
